title: Jug, ca. 1800–10
provenance: McKearin's Antiques, Hoosick Falls, NY; about 1940 Phelps Warren, NY
description: Straigh-sided oval body with shaped lip, pouring spout, notched loop handlesides cut with sallow faceting under lip, then bands of diamonds, vertical flute, diamonds and wide flutes; a star on the bottom; glass bubbly, bluish

tombstone.epitaph:
Jug, ca. 1800–10.
ca. 1800–10. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-219.
